duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical support for the maintenance, calibration, and safety testing of medical imaging equipment across all locations.
Independently work on specialized medical imaging equipment such as Radiographic, Fluoroscopic, Mammography, Nuclear Medicine, Cat Scanners, and Cardiac Catherization / Vascular Imaging Systems.
Ensure accurate and timely documentation of all preventive maintenance and repairs to meet industry standards and compliance.
Flexibility, customer service, and good communication skills are essential.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Electronics, Biomedical Engineering, or related field with CRES - Certified Radiology Equipment Specialist certification.
